actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 154 of title 23, United States Code, to increase the national maximum speed limit to 60 miles per hour.

summary.text: Increases the national maximum speed limit from 55 to 60 miles per hour. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 154)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 154 of title 23, United States Code, to increase the national maximum speed limit to 60 miles per hour.
